div.p: Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xixo die maij Anno quo supra

the samyn day the aldirman and ballieis witht consent of party has
assignit this day xv dais as day of peremptour to Androu Culan
yongar to ansuer tile ane borghe' strekit apone him be sere Jonhne Ruthirfurd
for the wranguis' clemyne of nyntene yeris tak of his half nethis fisching
of the Raik

In the bailye court of abirdene haldin the xxij day of maij the yer'
forsaid the samyn say Jonhne Red deponit be his aith' that Androw
branche askit at aly byrs' sex s' and viij d' for the stane of Rasynnis
and scho hecht him bot v s' and iiij d' for Ilkan stane or ellis alsmekle'
as scho gaf tile vthiris And scho wald nocht consent to gif him mair'
thane v s' and iiij d' for the stane of al his rasynnis

Curia legalis balliuorum de Abirdene tenta per balliuos eisdem
vicesimo quinto die mensis maij Anno quo supra

dominus Johannes Ruthirfurd de tarlane miles Johannes Culan thomas prat Johannes
Wormet magister Andreas cadiow Richardus hile pater Johannes menyeis
thomas Waus Andreas Wentone murthdaicus glenmaluyn alexander traile
gilbertus gareache et Johannes stewin quj Jurati dicunt quod nesciunt
de quibus terris et annuis redditibus cum pertinenciis quondam mariota crab
mater Richardi Wricht obiit vltime vestita et sasita s et dicunt quod
dictus Richardus est legittimus et propinquior heres dicte quondam matris
sue et est legittime etatis

the samyn day the aldirman and the balyeis chargit Dauid menyes eldar
in the name of ellene mvresone his spous' to red thome the Waus'
hous' in the vuerkirkgat And to follow Androu Wentone eftir the
tenor of his obligacione

Eodem die Andreas cantuly vocatus ad respondendum plegio per Dauid hile
porrecto ut supra plenius continetur non comparuit quare precipitur thome Jameson'
secundo capere districtum et cetera et premunire eum ad proximam Curiam legalem tanquam quarto die
processus

Eodem die Willelmus Kimpty Constabilarius de Abirdene fecit constituit creauit
et nominauit prouidos viros Dauid menyes prepositum alexandrum de Camera filium
et thomam de camera suum fratrem germanum coniunctim et diuisim suos deputatos
et substituos dan' et conceden' eisdem suis deputatis ac ipsorum cuilibet insolid' coniunctim
et diuisim suas liberam et integram potestatem pro se et nomine ad excercendum sub se
et nomine suo dictum suum officium constabilitus et cetera promittens de Rato et grato

Eodem die dictus Willelmus constabilarius fecit constituit ordinauit et nominauit
philippum de Dunbreke suum seriandum et officiarum vsque ad festum penticostes
in Anno Domini et cetera nanagesimo prestito solito Juramento

In the balye Court of abirdene haldin the pennult day of maij
It was fundin and deliuerit be ane suorne assis' be the moutht
of Androu murray eldar tailysman that Androw cantuly sal deliuer
to Dauid hile xi peter of woll of the rest of xxv peter the said Dauid
payand' him alsmekile for Ilkan stane as he gaf to Jonhn' of ogiluy
for his woll And atour the said Dauid sale bring ane acquitance
of sevin li' fra the larde of Inuerugy or he resaue the said woll
and he sal pay him the remanys of the Siluer of the haile xxv
stane of woll at the resat of the said xi peter of woll

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos primo die Junij anno
quo supra

the quhilk day it was fundin be ward and geuin for dome
that Jonhne fechat yongar sale content ande pay to the procuratouris of
alexander Jonhnesone and Isabele brody thre levis of golde becaus' be
caus' he tuk to preif the saide thre levis pait within fourty
dais ande falyeit in his preif the quhilk the balyeis chargit him
to pay within terme of law

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane asiss' alexander chamer tailysman that
the assedacion maide be alexander Watsone to Syme of gardin of his land
liand in the castalgat now wedsett to Wat thomson' is gane
and the saide Walter chargit the said Symon' to red his land at the
next Witsonday And atour thai ordanit the said Symond' to cum
to morne befor the aldirman and balyeis and Jonhne sclatar is in his
hand and mak gud fatht quhat costis he has maid apone the
said lande sene the said assedacion was maide in it salbe allouit to
him Ande quhat that restis atour of the maile in the said Symondis
handis salbe gevin to the said Walter Ande the remanis of the said maile
Alexander Watsone sale pay to the saide Walter in continent sene the said Walter
was put in possessione of the saide lande

In the bailye court of abirdene haldin be the balyeis in the tolbutht the
secund day of June the yer forsaid Williame of Kintor grauntit him avand
to the wyf of thome gardiner xiij s' of Siluer the quhilk he oblist him
to pay othir in Siluer or malt at the next martimes hereftir al dilatouris
biput

The samyn day Syme of gardin grauntit him avand to Wat thomsone
xlviij s' of maile the quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme
of law

the samyn day Alexander Red deliuerit to Androw Waus x s' for the barrele of vnyonis
that Jonhne quhithed resauit and he sal pay iiij s' yet restand of the
said barell vnpait or ellis ger him be pait
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xii die Junij anno quo supra

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' James leslie tailisman
that Wil coupar sal pay to Robert huchousone xx s' for the teching'
of his sone and for his labour maide apone him tyme bigan

the samyn day it was ordanit be the assis' James leslie talysman that Jonhne
malysone suld sueir that he maide nay promitt to Richerd hile yongar
nor to Jhone Wormet one his behalf nor putt him in nay beleyf
of the butht vndir the tolbutht for the superseding' of ane barrell of Sal
mond' our yer that the saide Richerd suld haf his gude wile to the
saide butht And gif h the saide Jonhne sweuir nocht the saide the
saide Richerd sulde haf the saide butht in tak quhilkis was fundin' in the
townis hande And' thareftir the aldirman with avys' of the consal present
for the tyme sett the said butht to Richerd hile for ane yer' And'
in continent thomas mar bailye chargit Jonhne malisone to Rede the saide butht
ande deliuer the key to the saide Richerde

Eodem die Andreas Waus fecit constituit et ordanit ordinavit alexandrum rede suum procuratorem
legittimum ad petendum vniuersas summas peccuniarum sibi debit' et easdem recipiend'
exindeque quieteclamand' Et si necesse fuerit detinen' prosequend' promittens
de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij et cetera
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xvi die Junij Anno quo supra

quo die petrus bayne opidanus de trailsond' ac magister sub deo nauis mareknicht
de trailsond' vocate fatebatur se bene contentum et plenarie persolut' de omnibus
marcimoniis per dictum burgum videlicet per prepositum balliuos ac alios suos
comburgenses emptos et eosdem inde quieteclamauit imperpetuum pro se heredibus
suis ac aliis quibuscumque

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assise Alexander Rede talisman that thome
of mar the bailye is avand' to thome prat xi s' and viij d' that he resauit
fra him of beir siluer mair than he was avand' him quhilk the
balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The samyn day the wyf of androw branche protestit in hir husbandis
behalf that sene Richerd Wricht wald nocht cum to thar werk that
hir said husband micht haue remede of law of him in tyme to cum

div.head: Nomina Inquisicionis Andree Vmfray
div.p:
Alexander menyeis Jacobus leslie alexander rede Willelmus abirdour Jonhannes Wormet
Johannes menyeis andreas murray senior Robertus buchan Robertus crage Willelmus
andirsone Andreas Wyntone magister Richardus craufurd' alexander gray Dauid
prat et alexander nachty qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam magister Willelmus vmfray obiit
vltra vestitus de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de vno crofto le
spittal croft vocato Jacente inter
Ac de vno alio crofto le bradcroft vocato inter Croftum canonie ex boriali
et croftum Alexandri chamer ex australi occidentali Ac de alio crofto stany Rude
vocato inter croftum Andree murray ex boreali et croftum fratrum domus predicatorum ex
australi Ac de alio quodam crofto sandydaill vocato et de le berne Rude Jacente
infra territorium croftorum dicti burgi

the samyn day sere Jonhne Ruthirfurd in the name of androw vmfray solempnitlie
protestit quhat that the assis' had done that was chosin apone the seruing
of the breif of Inquest purchest be the saide Androw of quhat landis
and annuel Rentis vmquhil mastir Williame vmfray his brothir deit last westit
ande sesit suld' turne him to nay preiudice nay he micht haue remede of
law

the samyn day it was fundyne and deliuerit be the moutht of Jonhne Wormet
talysman for the assis' present for the tyme that Androw lammyntone sal pay
his fraucht to Jonhne of Culan eftir the tenor' of his chartir party maid
tharapon' and the said Androw was in Amerciament of the court for the wranguis' haldin
of the samyn

the samyn day the aldirman balyeis and the personis writin obefor apone the Inquest
and breyf seruing of Androw vmfray with avys' of vthiris diuers' of Consal and
communite present for the tyme grantit to Robert huchousone ane hundretht schil
lingis of thar' common' gudis in the yer jc s' of the doublyne of thar clerk
schippis quhil thai provid him samekile in ane vthir place And' the tene merkis
that litill sere Androw has of pension' of the tone eftir his deces'

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xvijo die Junij Anno
quosupra

the samyn day Androw branche callit and nocht comperit to ansuer
tile ane borghe strekit apone him be sere Jhon' Ruthirfurd' in the handis of alexander allansone seriand'
for the wranguis' withhalding' fra him of the Some of jc markis for the tane
half of costis and expensis that he maide agannis alexander of chavmer tharfor chargit
the balyeis chargit the saide officiar to pas' and tak ane distres' of the
saide Androwis and latt it to borghe' agan gif it be askit and warne him
to this day xv dais to ansuer to the saide borghe'

the samyn day sere Jonhne Ruthirfurde offerit him redy to fynd' caucion
souerte and law borrouis that Androw branche suld be skathtles
and vnhurt and vnhermit for him bot as law wile that he micht sayfle
cum and gange to defend' and ansuer to the borghe' strekit apon' him be the
saide knicht

Eodem die Dauid menyeis prepositus dominus Johannes ruthirfurde miles et
Alexander menyeis electi fuerunt commissarij ad proximum parleamentum
Curia balliuroum tenta in pretorio xxij die Junij anno quosupra

the samyn day Jonhne of lundoris was in amerciament of the court
conuikit be ane assis' for the ourbying' of Williame blinsele
and to amend' as law wile and to forber' in tyme to cum

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xxv die Junij anno
quo supra

Eodem die Robertus crag Dauid patricius adamson' matheus crage et Johannes
lilburne conuicti per assisam pro perturbio Jacobi chesame Johannis halt et
et quilibet ipsorum in amerciamento Curie Necnon dicti Jacobus Johannes
et conuicti pro perturbio maiore crudeli dictarum personarum et quilibet ipsorum in
amerciamento Curie et ad emendandum alteri parti inter Jura volunt et consequent'
dicte partes fide media se obligarunt ad standum et subeundum constitucioni et ordi
nacionem assise penes emendas faciendas burgo et parti

the saide day it was fundit ordanit and deliuerit be the suorne assis'
that James cheyschame and Jonhne halt sal syttan done one thar knez'
and ask the balyeis and consal forgewnes in Name of the tone' And'
the said Jonhne sal one his kne ask I Dauid adamson forgewnes
and requer the tone to pray the tovne said Dauid to Remitt the Rancour'
of his hert for the saide offence done to him Alsua the saide James and Jhon'
sal ask the saide Robert mathow and Jonhne lilburne forgyffnes for the
said strubulance and thai to Remytt thame And' atour becaus' the saide
strubulance mowit in the saidez James cheyshame and Jonhne halt
thai sal pay demi stane of wax to the haly blud licht in continent
And' gyf euire thai committ ony sic offens' to the saide party or tile ony vthiris
within the burghe' in tyme to cum thai sal pay jc s' to Sanct Nicholes werk
vnforgewin'

The first day of Julij the yer forsaide Robert ouchtirles' tuk was
chargit be the ballieis to bring his dettour' befor thaim this day
xv dais to mak pament to William quhit of Sex markis and ane
half Ande falyeing' tharof thai ordanit him to pay the said money to
the saide William the forsaide day eftir the tenor' of the akis obefore
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio Sexto die Julij Anno quo supra

the quhilk day thome Waus grantit that he resauit sevin barrelis of meile
fra Jonhne the ros' quhilk he suld deliuer to alexander Red and Williame
futhes procuratoris to the saide Jhone Ros' and grantit him to deliuer thaim the
forsaide vij barrelis of meile

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Alexander Red
talysman that thome Waus and the skippar sal deliuer and pay to
thome of chavmer iij barrelis of meile he fyndand' souerte to keipe
thame skathtles of the man that laid in the saide meile And'
he fand' patrik red souerte to keip tham skathtles' of the saide
iij barrelis of meile for al tham quhom it efferis

In the bailye court of Abirdene haldin the ix day of
July the yer of god et cetera lxxxix yeris Alexander angusone
yongar grantit him borghe' to William Wormet for xxxti
s' vsual money of Scotlande to haue bene pait him
the terme bigan quhilk the balyeis chargit him to pay
within terme of law
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio x die Julij Anno quo supra

the samyn day Donald sclatar grantit him avand' to sere Jonhne of
Stirueling xlv s' of Siluer of maile quhilk he oblist him to pay
be his hande halding' vp to the balyeis

The samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' Androw Dauid murray talisman
that Androw philpsone sal pay to Dauid gichtan alsmekile for ane Rinsche
guthtling' as the said Dauid borrouit it for And the saide Androw sal mak
covnt to the laif of the merchandis of the Remanis of the Siluer that is in
his handis mair thane the said Rinsche guthtlinge
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xiiij die Julij Anno quo supra

the samyn day Jonhne of lammyntone in Amerciament of the court for
threthe wranguis' occupacion of Dauid hillis butht

The samyn day William vmfray was in Amerciament of the court for the wrang
uis' withhalding' of vij barrellis of meile fra alexander Red and William futhes
procuratouris to Jhone the Ros' quhilk the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of
law

Thome chamer the tailyour in amerciament of the court be ane assis' for
the wranguis' haldin' of his fraucht fra thome the Waus quhilk
the ballieis chargit him to pay or he passit out of the tolbutht

Ellene parfit conuikit be ane assis' for the wranguis' haldin of tua
gaudeys and the remanis of thris' fifty querour' bedis fra marione
sanchar quhilk the ballieis chargit the saide ellene to pay within terme
of law

The samyn day Williame prat was in Amerciament of the Court and conuikit be
ane assise for the wranguis' borghe' streking' vpone Jonhne litstar
for the leving' of his croft wast vnsawing' and the saide Jonhne
quyt of his challance and clame
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xv die Julij anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes fechat resignauit in manibus thome mar ballivi
vnum annuim annuum Redditum xiij s' et iiij d' de terra sua anteriore Jacente in vico
superiore ecclesie inter terram quondam Johannis stok ex orientali et terram quondam Andree
scherar ex occidentali ad dandum sasinam eiusdem Willelmo goldsmitht procuratori Alexandri
Jonhneson donec sibi satisfactum fuerit de tribus peciis auri le levys
Testibus domino Johanne ruthirfurde Johanne Culane Johanne menyeis Richardo
culane Willelmo futhes thoma Waus Willelmo cuming et domino Roberto
leys Notario publico cum multis aliis

The samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' James leslie talysman
that thome Waus sal pay and deliuer to alexander Red and Williame fuches
procuratoris to Jonhne Ros' ane barrele of Ry meile

the samyn day Jonhne collett follouit Jonhne of culane for his hering'
and the saide Jonhne was fundin quyt tharof be ane assise

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' James leslie talisman that
aly birs' sal pay to androu branche vi s' for Ilkan stane of rasynnis
that scho resauit fra him and xij s' for Ilkan barrell of vnyonnis

The samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be the said assis' that James peter
sal remane xv dais with Jonhne of Culane and gif he schevis nocht his diligens
to the ladyn' of the saide schip xv dais being' runnyn he sal haf his half hyer
the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' that thome of culane sal
deliuer ane barrell of Ry meile to thome Waus

In the bailye court of abirdene haldin the xvij day of Julij the yer
forsaide It was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' William blinsele talisman
that thome Waus and the merchandis in his bile sal set souerte to Jonhne Domrik
skippar of trailsonde that he sal haue alsmekile gudis that he lays done
and pais in lotting' with the merchandis of the gudis that hapinnis to be
Recouerit fra the hollandaris eftir the tenor' of thar writ deliuerit to the
merchandis of abirdene quhilk writ thome Waus has in keping'

Eodem die hans' Domrik opidanus de trailsonde fecit constitut creauit
et nominavit murdaicum glenmaluyn suum legitimum procuratorem ad petendum et
recipiendum bona predicta et Inde acquitandum Ac si necesse fuerit
detinen' prosequend' Promittens de Rato et grato et cetera

In the balye court of abirdene the xxti day of July forsaid the officiar'
thome Jamesone at commavnd of the ballieis chargit hans' Domrik skippar
of trailsone to remane in the tolbutht quhil he pait his lotting' sa far
as pertenis to his part of thre barrellis of meile to Jonhne of gilrutht

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' that hans' Dromrik skippar
of trailsond sal pay to thomas prat his keilhir' becaus' he Intro
mettit with his keile And' the said skippar to follow the merchandis
to releyf him eftir the tenor of thar chartir party

the samyn day thome of culane was in amerciament of the court for the wranguis'
borghe' strekyne apone Alexander angousone yongar for the withhalding of ane
barrele of ry meile fra him and the saide alexander quyt of his challance

xxiiij die Julij anno quo supra Willelmus nory fecit constitut creauit et nominavit patricium
andirson' suum legitimum procuratorem ad petendum recipiendum ab alexandro menyes quatuor mensuras
brasij et Inde acquitandum ac in omnibus aliis actionibus ipsum tangentibus et concernentibus
Et si necesse fuerit prosequend' coram quocumque Judice competen' Promittens de
Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij et cetera

In the bailye court of abirdene haldin the xxiiij day of July the yer
forsaide The aldirman and consal present for the tyme ordanit and consalit
the balyeis to pas' to Jonhne fechatis gudis quhar thai micht be comprehendit
and mak tham be prisit to the availe of thre levis of gold aucht to
William goldmitht procurator to Alexander Jhonson' and Isabell brody and to mak
him pait of the samyn And' thai aw to tak nay land na annuell
quhar gudis may be comprehendit and gottyne
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio tercio die Augusti anno quosupra

the samyn day murthow glenmaluyn tuk to preyf one friday that
next cumis that his aventour is passit of the punde gret aucht be him
to thome lovsone

head.add: gordon' blinseleThis marginal heading is placed on page 133.

div.p:
the samyn day sere Jonhne ruthirfurd and Dauid menyeis aldirman grantit to
pay to mastir adam of gordone dene of cathnes and procurator to the
chaptour of cathnes the annuatim pension' aucht to the said chaptour be
the towne of iiij yeris bigan that thai war in office that is to say the
saide knicht for iij yeris and the aldirman for ane yer And'
Robert blinsell grantit that he wald stand at the ordinance of
my lord of abirdene gif he fand that the acquitance gevin' to him
be prosper bischop of cathnes be of waile or nocht And' gif my
lorde of abirdene fyndis the saide acquitance of waile the said Robert
is quyt of the challance of mastir Adam gordon' dene of cathnes
and procuratour' to the chaptour of cathnes And gif it be nocht fundyne of waile
he sal stand at the ordinance of my lord of abirdene tharanent and the said
mastir adam consentit tharto

the samyn day thome prat grantit his pouer was expirit in it self
that he follouit Williame blinsell with for the v markis of pension' aucht
to the cathedrale kirk of cathnes quhene the said William Wat
bailye and renuncit the proces' led apone the said Williame tharanent

The samyn day Jonhne of gilrutht fand Williame of tulidef borghe'
to Dauid menyes aldirman for ane fatt of yoppinbeir' to mak him
burges And' the saide Jonhne oblist him be his hand to freth' the said
Williame Alsua patrik andirson' come borghe' for William nory to
the aldirman for ane vthir fatt of yoppinbeir' for his fredome And'
the saide Williame oblist him be his hand to keipe the said patrik
skathles of the saide borougange

In the bailye court of abirden' haldin the ferde day of august
the yer forsaide / Dauid Kintor grantit him borghe' and dettour
to thome gardiner for half ane barrell of Salmond And' the
widew of Ranald tailyour' grantit hir to freith' the saide Dauid
of the saide half ane barrele of Salmond and oblist hir to gif gudis
in pennyworthis to the officaris to pres' for the samyn And Androw
branche the balye chargit the said Dauid to mak the said thomas
be pait within terme of law and the said widew to relef the said Dauid
of the samyn

In the balye court of abirdene haldin the xij day of august the yer forsaide
it was fundin ande deliuerit be ane assise Williame abirdour forspekar that
Jonhne lilburne sal content and pay to magnys Wormet or his factouris the some
of ix li' and fiwe s' to gude compt and rekning for his part of the fracht
of the litile kerueille

The samyn day Alexander angusone yongar grantit him to haue resauit fra
Jonhne lilburne xxxij li' ande vij s' of the fraucht of the litill kerueile

In the bailye court of abirdene haldin the xvij day of august the yer
forsaide Alexander angusone yongar gravntit him avand' to William of gareache yongar
tene nettis of gret salt the quhilk the ballieis chargit him to pay
within terme of law or ellis the price that it gevis now

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis with consent of batht the partiis assig
nit to Androu Wentone to ansuer to Williame gareache mydlar and to
arthour forbes his procurator within xxiiij houris eftir he be warnit personaly
eftir the hamecumin fra the sege of Dunbertane for fiftene fraunkis waring'
of quhet as day of peremptour And' the saide androw affermis the depo
sicionis of the witnes to be takin in the saide matir quhar euir he
be he seyand' the articulis that thai suld' sueir vpone obefore
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxvjo die augusti anno quo supra

Eodem die Willelmus gray in amerciamento Curie per confessionem lingue proprie pro
perturbio mariote franky et ad emendandum ut iura volunt

Agnes gyffarde affedata Willelmi gray in amerciamento Curie per confessionem proprie
lingue pro perturbio mariote franky et ad emendandum ut iura volunt
et dicta mariota quita per assisam de omni perturbio ipsorum Willelmi et agnetis

Eodem die Robertus buchane in amerciamento curie per assisam pro perturbio
Dauid prat et Idem Dauid in amerciamento Curie pro perturbio dicti Roberti
Quapropter ordinatum fuit per assisam quod dictus Robertus soluet quinque
s' edificacioni chori et prefatus Dauid duos s'

The samyn day it was statutit ordanit and deliuerit be the assis' gif Robert
of buchane or ony wthir blasphemys or iniuris ony taxtour' in tyme
to cum in worde ore deide and beis conuikit tharintill sal pay jc s' to the
bigin of Sanct Nicholes' werk vnforgewin

Eodem die Willelmus prat convuictus per assisam pro perturbio Roberti
buchane quapropter soluet constructionj chori tres s'

the samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be the saide assis' William
blinsel talysman that Will gray and Agnes gyffarde his affedate
ande the mane that led thar fuell sal cum befor the aldirman and ballieis
and depone the gret aithe how mekile thai lede of marione fraickis elding'
ande restoire hir samony agane And' for the amendis the said William sale
pay xx s' to the said marione tharof half ane mark in hand and the remanent
at the sicht of the aldirman ballieis and part of the assis' And' atour he
sal pay j li' of waxe to the haly blud licht and ij s' to the kirk werk

The samyne day it was fundin and deliuerit be the saide assise that morice
lange mastir vndir gode of the cristofir of trailsonde and al his clerkis
sal cum one friday that next cumis befor the aldirman and balyeis
within the tolbutht and mak gud fatht that thai haue nocht skathit
the merchandis gudis in nay place sone thai resauit thaim bot thai
haue deliuerit it thaim lelely and treulie And' the said mastir sal deliuer
to Jonhne Waus of hadingtone xj nettis of Ry that he wantis
of his full

The samyn day the saide morice mastir of the cristofir and certane merchandis
of hadingtone and leithe that is to say Jonhne Waus laurence
flemyng' and thar complicis grantit and opinly declarit for the manifestacion
of the verite that the trailsoundis last of Ry extendis to xxviij
bollis of our' wattir manir meytt

the samyn day laurence lousone citenour of SanctAndreis quiet'
clamyt and dischargit James Dais skippar of Danskin and Jonhne
sklatar burges of abirdene of al clamys and Interess'

The samyne day James Days skippar of Danskin grantit him avand'
to Alexander of balcankile tuelf crounis and demi

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio vltimo die mensis Augusti
Anno quo supra

the said day it was deliuerit be ane asisse James colisone talisman
that thomas farchar sulde sueir' the gret aithe' that he resauit nocht
the barrele of ry meile clamyt be mastir Androw cadiow one lang
marionis' behalf nor yet he wist nocht of it nor hed na profyt
of it and he is quyt of the said barrele And' in continent the saide
thomas sueir the gret aithe according' to the deliuerance of the assise

Eodem die Andreas balcomy in amerciamento curie pro perturbio Johannis vrchald
et Andreas Wauche in Amerciamento Curie pro perturbio dicti Johannis Et ipse
Johannes conuictus per assisam pro perturbio prefati Andreas balcomy

In the bailye court of abirdene haldin' the secunde day of September'
the yer forsaide Androu lammyngtone in Amerciament of the court be
his avne tonge graunt for strubulance of the court and til amend' as
law wile and forbeir in tyme to cum

the samyn day Androu lammyntone in Amerciament of the court for the wranguis'
withhalding' of thre yeris fee fra Robert huchonsone quhilk the balyeis
chargit him to pay within terme of law

Eodem die coram Andrea Culane vno balliuorum marioria broysour filia
et vna heredum quondam thome broysour cum consensu Roberti murray sponsi
sui fecit constituit et ordinavit thomam de camera filium secundarium alexandri
chamer de murchill suum assignatum et procuratorem Irreuocabilem legittimum statum et sasinam
tocius partis sue de terra quondam patris sui Jacente in futy et eandem sibimet
retinere ac pro sue libito voluntatis disponere in veberiore vberiore forma assignatis
et procuratorij promittens de Rato et grato Testibus magistro Andrea liall
officiali abirdonensis Roberto blinsele Johanne colisone Dauid mathesone
Andrea murray Juniore gilberto Riburne cum diuersis Aliis

Eodem die in publica curia cristina compar filia quondam Agnetis broysour
et vna heredum olim thome broysour auj sui et Johannes coupar tutor
et pater agnetis coupar alterius heredis dicti thome fecerunt thomam de camera suum
procuratorem et assignatum ad partem sibi contingentem de terra olim dicti thome aui suj ut
premittitur promittens de Rato prout plenius in quibusdam Instrumentis continetur
testibus Dauid menyeis preposito thoma mar Andrea branche ballivis
Roberto blinsele Alexandro chamer filio Johanne Westland et Johanne tailyour
Judicatore curie

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio ixo die Septembris
Anno quo supra

the samyn day Williame Dunbrek grantit
that he was borghe' to Sandy allansone officiar for xxxti d' quhilk
the ballieis chargit the saide William to pay within terme of law

The xii day of September the yer forsaid the aldirman ballieis consale
and' communite gathtreyt grauntit ande consentit be thar aithis to thir
artikilis and opunionnis vndir writin subscriuit with diuers' lordis and baronnis
handis In the first quhar our Souerane lord was slane and nay punicion maid
tharfor apone the tresonabile vile personis that putt thar handis violentlie in his
mast nobile persone quhais saule god assolye to se for pvnicion of that treso
nabile personis committaris of the saide slauchtir Secundly for the reformacione'
of the mysgouerance of our Souerane lordis tresour' and disposicione of his heretage
menesand' his autorite and crovne And als for the remede ande Souerte of our'
Souerane lordis mast nobile persone and of our lordis his brethir And in likuys' his
tresour strinthtis and artalyery to be putt in Souer and comptabile mennys
handis to the vtilite and profit of our' Souerane lord and his successouris be the
avys' and consal of the thre estatis / Alsua that al ransoms' tane be ony maner
of mane of ony of the kingis liegis spirituale or temporale be restorit and gevin'
agane And alsua that his lawis and Justice be ministerit throw his realme
to al his liegis equaly according to the plesance of gode common' profit of
the realme and legis And' grantit thar commone Sele tharapone
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xvjo die Septembris Anno quosupra

the samyne day george eduardson' burges of edinburghe producit befor the
aldirman and balyeis thir previs vndir to preif ane new condicion maid
betuix him and Jhone schaue for xij li' anent the fraucht of ane schipe
as is contenit in the court haldin' befor the prouest and balyeis of edinburghe
at mair lyntht quhilkis suorne in presence of James Dais procurator
to the saide Jonhne schaue deponit as eftir follouis et cetera In the first
Philpe of Dunbrek declarit that he bystud herde and saw quhen
Jonhne schaue and James Dais askit xiij li' and x s' fra george eduardson'
for fraucht to saile hamwart to leithe and the said george bad tham
xij li' / gilbert menyeis deponit the samyn Duncan smytht deponit
he herd the saide Jonhne and James ask xv li' fra george eduardson' for
thar fraucht to leithe and george bade tham bot xij li' And' atour he saide he
herd the aldirman and his houshald' ask say thai askit eftiruart xiij li' and demi
Jonhne gibsone deponit that thar was ane new condicion maid in Abirdene to
sayle hamwart to leith ande george eduardson' saide he wald gyff thame
bot xij li' for thar fraucht and thai askit na mair' bot xiij li' and demi
And Dauid leis deponit he herd george eduardson' bade tham xij li' and thai askit
xiij li' and demi
